remarks: The law of concretion for operation class abstraction.  Compare ~ elopab .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
eloprabg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
eloprabg.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
eloprabg.3 $e |- ( z = C -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
eloprabg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( <. <. A , B >. , C >. e. { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } <-> th ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d th x y z $.
